description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As an entrepreneur, thinker, and coder, he's passionate about transforming education and knowledge sharing. He founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format, advocating for an impactful and inclusive internet. Based in Taipei, yeehaa focuses on uniting people around common values and translating shared visions into effective ecosystems. His work explores concepts like ecosystem architecture, internet fragmentation, and the global village in the digital age. yeehaa's courses cover topics such as personal ecosystem grooming, preserving web diversity, and practicing innovation, reflecting his multidisciplinary approach to fostering sustainable, creative, and interconnected digital landscapes.
blurb: yeehaa, an ecosystem architect with a PhD, blends tech and philosophy to transform education and foster inclusive digital landscapes. His work explores ecosystem architecture, internet fragmentation, and innovation practices.
